channel.title: NameQuick Updates
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.9.23
item.description:
NameQuick v1.9.23

Whatâ€™s New

Date Placeholders

  • Add custom date formats to your file names
  • Automatically detect dates from file content
  • Use creation date, modification date, or extracted dates

Better Pattern Editor

  • Improved prefix and suffix support
  • Live preview of filename changes
  • Organized placeholder categories

Fixes

  • Fixed pattern parsing issues
  • Resolved placeholder formatting bugs
  • Better error handling

Make your file naming more powerful with custom date formats and improved patterns.
